Package src.model.game

Class QuartoModel

java.lang.Object
src.model.game.QuartoModel
public class QuartoModel extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuartoModel​(int index)
    Constructs a new QuartoModel instance with the specified index.
    QuartoModel​(int firstPlayerType, int secondPlayerType, String firstPlayerName, String secondPlayerName)
    Constructs a new QuartoModel instance without heuristics for non-MiniMax AI players.
    QuartoModel​(int firstPlayerType, int secondPlayerType, String firstPlayerName, String secondPlayerName, Heuristics heuristic1, Heuristics heuristic2)
    Constructs a new QuartoModel instance with heuristics for MiniMax AI players.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuartoModel

      public QuartoModel​(int index)
      Constructs a new QuartoModel instance with the specified index. Initializes the game board, file manager, and slot manager. Charges the game with the provided index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the game.

    • QuartoModel

      public QuartoModel​(int firstPlayerType, int secondPlayerType, String firstPlayerName, String secondPlayerName)
      Constructs a new QuartoModel instance without heuristics for non-MiniMax AI players.
      Parameters:
      firstPlayerType - The type of the first player.
      secondPlayerType - The type of the second player.
      firstPlayerName - The name of the first player.
      secondPlayerName - The name of the second player.

    • QuartoModel

      public QuartoModel​(int firstPlayerType, int secondPlayerType, String firstPlayerName, String secondPlayerName, Heuristics heuristic1, Heuristics heuristic2)
      Constructs a new QuartoModel instance with heuristics for MiniMax AI players.
      Parameters:
      firstPlayerType - The type of the first player.
      secondPlayerType - The type of the second player.
      firstPlayerName - The name of the first player.
      secondPlayerName - The name of the second player.
      heuristic1 - The heuristics for the first player.
      heuristic2 - The heuristics for the second player.

  • Method Details

    • getBoard

      public QuartoBoard getBoard()
      Gets the QuartoBoard instance associated with this model.
      Returns:
      The QuartoBoard instance.

    • getPlayerManager

      public QuartoPlayerManager getPlayerManager()
      Gets the QuartoPlayerManager instance associated with this model.
      Returns:
      The QuartoPlayerManager instance.

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redoes the last undone action in the game. If redo is available, updates the game state accordingly.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the last action in the game. If undo is available, updates the game state accordingly.

    • selectPawn

      public void selectPawn​(int indexPawn)
      Selects a pawn with the specified index for the current player.
      Parameters:
      indexPawn - The index of the pawn to select.

    • selectPawnHuman

      public void selectPawnHuman​(int indexPawn)
      Allows a human player to select a pawn with the specified index and place it on the board. Updates the game state accordingly.
      Parameters:
      indexPawn - The index of the pawn to select and place.

    • playShot

      public void playShot​(int line, int column)
      Plays a shot at the specified position on the game board for the current player.
      Parameters:
      line - The line index.
      column - The column index.

    • playShotHuman

      public void playShotHuman​(int line, int column)
      Allows a human player to play a shot at the specified position on the game board. Updates the game state accordingly.
      Parameters:
      line - The line index.
      column - The column index.

    • redoLoop

      public void redoLoop​(int countUndo)
      Redoes a sequence of undo actions specified by the countUndo parameter.
      Parameters:
      countUndo - The number of undo actions to redo.

    • checkInfoPlayer

      public boolean checkInfoPlayer​(int index)
      Checks the information of the player from the specified index. Loads player information from the slot files directory. Initializes the player manager with the loaded information.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the player's information to check.
      Returns:
      True if player information is successfully loaded, false otherwise.

    • chargeGame

      public void chargeGame​(int index)
      Charges the game state based on the player information from the specified index. If successful, updates the game board and player manager accordingly.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the player's information to charge.

    • saveFile

      public void saveFile​(String fileName) throws IOException
      Saves the current game state to a file with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to save the game state to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while saving the file.

    • hasAWinner

      public boolean hasAWinner()
      Checks if the game has a winner.
      Returns:
      True if there is a winner, false otherwise.

    • isATie

      public boolean isATie()
      Checks if the game is tied.
      Returns:
      True if the game is tied, false otherwise.

    • getPawn

      public QuartoPawn getPawn​(int pawnIndex)
      Retrieves the QuartoPawn at the specified index from the available pawns list.
      Parameters:
      pawnIndex - The index of the pawn to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The QuartoPawn at the specified index.

    • getCurrentState

      public QuartoHistory getCurrentState()
      Retrieves the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The current state of the game as a QuartoHistory object.

    • getFirstState

      public QuartoHistory getFirstState()
      Retrieves the initial state of the game.
      Returns:
      The initial state of the game as a QuartoHistory object.

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Checks if undo action is possible.
      Returns:
      True if undo action is possible, false otherwise.

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Checks if redo action is possible.
      Returns:
      True if redo action is possible, false otherwise.

    • stateOfGame

      public int stateOfGame()
      Retrieves the state of the game.
      Returns:
      The state of the game: - 0 if it's the beginning of the game, - 1 if the game is ongoing.

    • delay

      public void delay​(int ms)
      Delays the execution of the program for the specified number of milliseconds. Used for AI plays
      Parameters:
      ms - The number of milliseconds to delay the execution.

    • getPawnAvailable

      public QuartoPawn[] getPawnAvailable()
      Retrieves the array of available pawns on the board.
      Returns:
      An array of QuartoPawn objects representing available pawns.

    • getTable

      public QuartoPawn[][] getTable()
      Retrieves the 2D array representing the current state of the game board.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of QuartoPawn objects representing the game board.

    • isTableEmpty

      public boolean isTableEmpty​(int i, int j)
      Checks if the specified position on the game board is empty.
      Parameters:
      i - The row index.
      j - The column index.
      Returns:
      True if the position is empty, false otherwise.

    • getSelectedPawn

      public QuartoPawn getSelectedPawn()
      Retrieves the currently selected pawn.
      Returns:
      The currently selected QuartoPawn.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public int getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the index of the current player.
      Returns:
      The index of the current player.

    • isPawnListEmpty

      public boolean isPawnListEmpty()
      Checks if the list of available pawns is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the list of available pawns is empty, false otherwise.

    • getLines

      public QuartoPawn[][] getLines()
      Retrieves the lines of the game board.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of QuartoPawn objects representing the lines of the game board.

    • getColumns

      public QuartoPawn[][] getColumns()
      Retrieves the columns of the game board.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of QuartoPawn objects representing the columns of the game board.

    • getDiagonals

      public QuartoPawn[][] getDiagonals()
      Retrieves the diagonals of the game board.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of QuartoPawn objects representing the diagonals of the game board.

    • getWinLine

      public List<int[]> getWinLine()
      Retrieves the list of win lines on the game board. Each win line is represented by an array of integers containing the indices of the winning positions.
      Returns:
      A list of arrays representing the win lines.

    • getNameOfTheCurrentPlayer

      public String getNameOfTheCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the name of the current player.
      Returns:
      The name of the current player.

    • getPlayer1Name

      public String getPlayer1Name()
      Retrieves the name of player 1.
      Returns:
      The name of player 1.

    • getPlayer2Name

      public String getPlayer2Name()
      Retrieves the name of player 2.
      Returns:
      The name of player 2.

    • getPlayer1Type

      public int getPlayer1Type()
      Retrieves the type of player 1.
      Returns:
      The type of player 1.

    • getPlayer2Type

      public int getPlayer2Type()
      Retrieves the type of player 2.
      Returns:
      The type of player 2.

    • winSituation

      public boolean winSituation​(int line, int column)
      Checks if a winning situation occurs after placing a pawn at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      line - The line index.
      column - The column index.
      Returns:
      True if a winning situation occurs, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPlayerType

      public int getCurrentPlayerType()
      Retrieves the type of the current player.
      Returns:
      The type of the current player.

    • setSelectedPawn

      public void setSelectedPawn​(QuartoPawn quartoPawn)
      Sets the currently selected pawn on the board.
      Parameters:
      quartoPawn - The pawn to set as selected.

    • switchPlayer

      public void switchPlayer()
      Switches the current player to the next player.

    • getPawnAtPosition

      public QuartoPawn getPawnAtPosition​(int i, int j)
      Retrieves the pawn at the specified position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      i - The row index.
      j - The column index.
      Returns:
      The QuartoPawn at the specified position.

    • getSave

      public QuartoHistory getSave()
      Retrieves the current save state of the game.
      Returns:
      The current save state of the game as a QuartoHistory object.
